Package ca.nengo.ui.lib.world.piccolo.objects

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractButton
    Button which executes an action on click
    Border
    Adds a border around an object.
    BoundsHandle
    PBoundsHandle a handle for resizing the bounds of another node.
    Button
    A button which draws itself as a WorldObject
    RectangularEdge
    An set 4 edges which attach the respective corners of its starting and ending nodes.
    SelectionBorder
    A Border instance that can change its object of focus (As long as the object are within the world that the frame is in).
    TextButton
    A Button whose represntation is a text label
    TooltipWrapper  
    Window  
    Wrapper
    A World Object which does nothing but wrap another world object to add a layer of indirection.
